content: I'd like to get luthien running in this repo - see instructions in /build/cheatsheet.md
Started Luthien proxy services via quick_start.sh. Gateway healthy. User needs to exit and relaunch Claude Code through the proxy.
cd /Users/scottwofford/build/luthien-proxy && claude --resume 82cc8674-3199-411c-adc7-0f1be75f325d
Confirmed running through Luthien. Gateway healthy at localhost:8000.
I'd like to resume what we were working on from prior chat. can you find it?
Found context in dev/OBJECTIVE.md. Phase 1 complete. Phase 2 (Trap System) in planning. Waiting on Adrian's answers to clarifying questions about super traps, visibility, materials, building.
Dale, Tina. Tabla de materiales, presiones material y empiezas a construir... (Adrian explaining trap system vision)
Translated questions to Spanish for Adrian. Questions about super traps, visibility, materials, building mechanics.
Unas trampas que no te pueden salir... para los jugadores... Si caes en la supertrampa ya perdiste...
Captured Adrian's answers: Super trap = can't escape = instant loss. 1 per level. All traps visible. No material limit. Must stop to build. Traps colored by player.
yes, also add a file called openquestions.md with more questions we can discuss at dinner.
Created dev/openquestions.md with dinner discussion questions. Started implementing lava traps and super trap in game.js.
make the players be characters, not blocks. also, how to exit?
Changed players from rectangles to emoji characters (游붔 游뱄). Exit Claude Code with /exit or Ctrl+C.
100px
Made players 100px.
move out of luthien research folder in github. it should instead just be in my personal folder
Explained GitHub transfer process. User transferred repo, then updated git remote to scottwofford/adrian-maze-game.
update the readme with the decisions we've already made
Updated README with all design decisions: Phaser 3, 2D platformer, controls, health/lives, trap system details, phase roadmap.
ok make the players smaller, maybe 60px
Made players 60px with 48x60 hitbox.
remove all the traps
Removed/disabled all traps. Pre-existing traps and super trap commented out per Adrian's clarification that players build ALL traps.

No hay trampas que nadie construy칩... necesitamos un bot칩n para construir trampas... materiales son fuego, agua, le침a, arena... bot칩n para excavar... no puedes caer en tu propia trampa... trampa color = player color
Captured Adrian's trap building design: Materials (Fire, Water, Wood, Sand), dig button, build button, can't fall in own trap, traps colored by player (red=P1, blue=P2).
how many lines of code have we written?
~400 lines total (341 in game.js + 58 in index.html)
always reply in english and spanish. add that to this project's claude.md file - restate Adrian's trap system in spanish
Updated CLAUDE.md with bilingual requirement. Restated trap system in both languages.
I feel like we've got disorganized questions. one file with questions another with answers. consolidate everything in the readme file
Consolidated all Q&A into README.md. Deleted dev/openquestions.md. One source of truth now.
commit the changes
Committed: feat: Phase 2 trap system + player characters (08d9d53)
git push
Pushed to github.com/scottwofford/adrian-maze-game
Cu치ntas trampas? Ilimitadas. Cu치ntos puntos por trampa? Uno. A cero puntos? Pierdes. Los dos llegan a la salida? Empatan, otra vez. Unicornio vuela? S칤 (Phase 3). Princesas? No.
Updated README with Adrian's answers: Unlimited traps, 1 point per trap, 0 points = lose, tie = restart, unicorn flies (Phase 3), no princesses.
yep, also use Luthien's logging functionality to create a csv...
Queried Luthien database for conversation events. Created CSV export. Committed and pushed all changes.
ok now write me an email with instructions to Luis and Adrian about how to make progress on the videogame even though they'll be in NYC...
Created docs/EMAIL_FOR_LUIS_AND_ADRIAN.md with bilingual instructions for resuming the session, installing Claude Code, and continuing development.
Also, please cleanup the repo. it seems like we've still got multiple questions / answers files floating around, consolidate and also put tree explanation in a separate folder called /learning
Created /learning folder. Moved docs there. Created GETTING_STARTED.md for beginners. Archived old feedback file.
in /learning please rename files so they go in order. 1 should be email, 2 getting started, etc. and the documents should make sense when read exactly in that order
Renamed files: 01_EMAIL_FOR_LUIS, 02_GETTING_STARTED, 03_HOW_TO_RUN, 04_PROJECT_STRUCTURE, 05_TREE_EXPLANATION_FOR_ADRIAN. Added navigation links between all docs.
(Session resumed after context limit)
Completed adding navigation links to all learning docs. Committed and pushed cleanup changes.

also, I use gmail, is there an easy way to queue up an email. also in email I want to include instructions. also I see you're compacting the conversation, make sure that everything's still being captured in Luthien logs (full) and csv is updated. Also move csv to this repo so I can link to it in my email. perhaps add to dev/context/prompts_and_replies
Moved CSV to dev/context/prompts_and_replies/conversation_log.csv. Updated with recent entries. Explaining Gmail schedule send feature.
where in /learning should I add how to onboard to Luthien. In email, offer a call to help him get setup
Created 06_OPTIONAL_LUTHIEN_SETUP.md with Docker/proxy setup instructions. Updated email to offer 30-min setup call. Added Luthien doc to navigation.
